Class Assignment

java.lang.Object
Assignment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Print
public class Assignment extends Object implements Print
Class assignment contains methods to create/view/modify assignments

Said

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addAssignment()
    This method takes user input for assignment and adds an assignment to the assignment table (mySQL) Calls Queries.printList("courses"), Queries.InsertIntoDatabase(), Queries.createTasksFromAssignments
    void
    changeAssignmentDeadline()
    Changes the deadline of an assignment record in DB Calls Queries.PrintList("courses"), Queries.changeDeadline()
    void
    deleteAssignment()
    Takes user input to delete an assignment from DB Calls Queries.printGrades("completedassignments"), Queries.printGrades("assignments"), Queries.deleteRecord()

    • addAssignment

      public void addAssignment()
      This method takes user input for assignment and adds an assignment to the assignment table (mySQL) Calls Queries.printList("courses"), Queries.InsertIntoDatabase(), Queries.createTasksFromAssignments

    • deleteAssignment

      public void deleteAssignment()
      Takes user input to delete an assignment from DB Calls Queries.printGrades("completedassignments"), Queries.printGrades("assignments"), Queries.deleteRecord()

    • submitAssignment

      public void submitAssignment()
      Moves a record from assignment to completedassignments in DB Calls Queries.printList("courses"), Queries.printCourseAssignments(), Queries.submitAssignment()

    • changeAssignmentDeadline

      public void changeAssignmentDeadline()
      Changes the deadline of an assignment record in DB Calls Queries.PrintList("courses"), Queries.changeDeadline()

    • updateAssignmentReceivedGrade

      public void updateAssignmentReceivedGrade()
      Updates a completedassignment record's received grade in DB Calls Queries.printList("courses"), Queries.printCourseAssignments(), Queries.updateReceivedGrade()

    • printAssignmnetInfo

      public void printAssignmnetInfo()
